trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lake Havasu City
There were no other sightings in Lake Havasu City on or around November 28th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMy family and.I were sitting out back we saw orange balls of lights coming off the mountains east of Lk Havasu City they were heading towards Phoenix. then after a few mins no more all to gather about 7 of them.Then we thought it was over we went and sat down and talk it over what we have seen.Then.I look up and over the edge of the roof there they were 5 of them the size of a cigarette pack with ice blue and white lights moving back and forth under the crafts.One of them was over my head stop and went straight up and turn into a star.The others move slowly to the south.There were two others to my left that became one.Has.I look closer.I saw an energy feel the stars were magnified thought it.As they move far there south they stop and move with the stars all night.If you came out of the house you would not have know they were there if you were not here when they came over the house.
